name: Auditor Saga 64
description:
Heaven has sent his best man down to audit Hell, to prepare for JUDDGMENT DAY! Let's see if he's up to the task!

there are 10 Stamp locations

--------------------------

CONTROLS:

Movement ---> WASD

Attack ---> MouseButton, A button

Jump ---> SpaceBar, Y button

Sprint ---> Shift, Left Trigger

--------------------------


Music: Glocknar
